feat: Add vibrant design system with gamification and animations

Transform ShipLoop from basic purple theme to a colorful, engaging indie hacker experience. Adds 20+ vibrant colors, playful animations, varied typography, and gamification elements throughout the dashboard to make shipping more fun and motivating.

Design System Features:
- 20+ vibrant colors \(purple, cyan, pink, emerald, orange, coral, peach, sky blue, etc.\)
- Space Grotesk font for scores/numbers, Fredoka for playful badges
- 12+ custom animations \(bounce, wiggle, glow-pulse-rainbow, shimmer, fire-pulse\)
- Shape variety \(pills, hexagons, tilted cards, blobs, stickers\)
- Emoji decorations throughout UI
- Canvas confetti celebrations for achievements

Component Enhancements:
- StatCard: Unique colors per metric with hover animations and shimmer effects
- ShipScoreCard: Rainbow glow pulse, geometric numbers, level progression
- StreakCounter: Fire animations, pill shape, milestone badges
- ActivityFeed: Color-coded items with emoji icons and floating animations
- QuickActions: Bounce hover effects with floating emoji decorations
- ProjectProgress: Enhanced progress bars with shimmer and glow effects
- Sidebar: Rainbow glow on active items, emoji navigation
- Header: Level display, achievement counter, animated notifications

New Files:
- src/lib/design-system.ts: Utility functions for colors, gradients, and animations
- src/lib/confetti.ts: Celebration effects \(achievements, streaks, level-ups, launches\)
- src/components/gamification/: Badge components for achievements and milestones

Dependencies:
- canvas-confetti: Celebration effects library

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
